meanings.definition: A person who excels or is the best in a particular field or activity.
meanings.sent1: In the spelling bee, Sarah was the topnotcher, winning first place.
meanings.sent2: The topnotcher in the race crossed the finish line with a huge lead.
meanings.sent3: At the science fair, Tim proved to be the topnotcher with his impressive volcano experiment.
meanings.sent4: Being a topnotcher in math, Emily always solves the most challenging problems effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The topnotcher of the art competition created a masterpiece that left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: Of the highest quality or rank.
meanings.sent1: The topnotcher restaurant in town always serves delicious food.
meanings.sent2: Her topnotcher performance in the play earned her a standing ovation.
meanings.sent3: The topnotcher diamond ring sparkled brightly on her finger.
meanings.sent4: The topnotcher hotel provided exceptional service to its guests.
meanings.sent5: The topnotcher car in the showroom gleamed under the bright lights.
